metadata.synopsis: Balthazar has left his room, and Nightsong's prison is still locked. He won't speak to palyers outside the safety of his room
metadata.how_to_trigger: Lure Balthazar outside of his room trigger - S_SHA_Necromancer_Lair_186344d1-746d-424e-8822-2c29179ab34c

0.speaker: Balthazar
0.text: Come inside. Then we can talk.
0.context: NodeContext: 'Not now' (returning to his room before he deigns to speak further)
